attributes.action: ask all NHS Trusts to arrange to disinfect the shoes of all hospital visitors and issue plastic overshoes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present patients are dying in hospitals from MSRA and CLOSTRIDIUM DIFFICILE which they have caught in the hospital. It is my contention that no matter how clean hospital floors are kept -every visitor is bringing into the buildings all kinds of filth on the bottoms of their shoes. I would like to see a check point at each entrance at which everyone has the bottoms of their shoes disinfected and are then issued with temp.sterile plastic overshoes.
